reviewText: The 2005 National Poetry Slam (NPS), held in Albuquerque, NM, was the first NPS I missed in six years, and every poet I knew was down there for it, raving about the incredible work being written and preformed! Although there is no substitution for seeing a poetry slam live, this DVD sure helps a slam poetry addict needing a fix! Check out the amazing and diverse work and be amazed!

Filmed LIVE at the 2005 NATIONAL POETRY SLAM in ALBUQUERQUE, NM, this DVD is the closest you'll get to seeing this AMAZING NIGHT O' WORDS in the flesh! See the best that the NATIONAL SLAM POETRY scene has to offer from the comfort of YR COUCH!
